Body: I have three Google accounts configured in my phone. I want to remove my master Google account without losing other important data of my phone. When I am trying to delete it, it is not allowing me to remove it, as some of the dependent application are installed with that Google account. I tried with removing those application also but still not able to remove it. Please suggest any solution other than factory reset?
Title: Delete my Google master account without factory reset?
